column4: well k3b appears to be burning this dual layer video dvd. "auto" for the speed setting gave 4.1x write speed. yuck. hopefully there's a faster manual select speed in that dropdown box.
firestarter is an interface for iptables, which is always running even when firestarter is not. do i have that right?
there is no point in it. it just initializes some iptables ruels
[uh that wasn't very clear] . firestarter sets up the rules, so firestarter always running would be silly. iptables is in the kernel and always running
